text: companies are increasing digital and
building modern applications utilizing
micro services and service architectures
to scale serve global customer base and
gain release velocity in this world of
business applications success means
better results
however monitoring distributed
applications and resources is
challenging because of their complexity
data overload and the fact that
monitoring tools were built to oversee
system and application performance and
physical silos to gain observability a
shift from looking for failures defining
answers is key the solution is Amazon
Cloud watch the cloud watch is a
monitoring and management service built
for developments system operators site
reliability engineers or sre and IT
managers cloud watch provides data and
actionable insights to monitor
applications analyze and respond to
system-wide performance changes optimize
resource utilization and get a unified
view of operational health cloud watcher
collects data in the form of logs
metrics and events providing a unified
view of AWS resources applications and
services and on-premise servers you can
use cloud watch to set high resolution
alarms visualise logs and metrics
side-by-side take automated actions
troubleshoot issues and discover
insights to optimize your applications
and ensure they're running smoothly
today Amazon Cloud watch monitors more
than 800 trillion metric observations
triggers more than 2 trillion events and
ingests more than 50 petabytes of logs
per month
with Amazon CloudWatch it is easy to get
started there's no upfront commitment or
minimum fee you simply pay for what you
use
turn on the insight by visiting
aws.amazon.com slash cloud watch
